QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, coalesce(date_service, date_specimen) as date_service, case when loinc_code is null or loinc_code = '' then test_ordered_name || '_' || result_name else loinc_code end as source, result_unit_of_measure, replace(result, chr(9), ' ') as result, data_vendor from {sc}.lab_tests JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where loinc_code is not null and test_ordered_name is not null and result_name is not null and coalesce(date_service, date_specimen) is not null order by ch.person_id
